text: Ashok Selvan (born 8 November 1989) is an Indian actor who works predominantly in Tamil cinema. He made his breakthrough playing one of the lead roles in Soodhu Kavvum (2013), before gaining critical acclaim for his performances in C. V. Kumar's productions Pizza II: Villa (2013) and Thegidi (2014). == References == *https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/ashok- selvan-and-shantanu-bhagyarajs-sports-drama-titled-blue- star/articleshow/100394849.cms?from=mdr *https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/pa-ranjiths-next-production- starring-ashok-selvan-and-shanthnu-titled-blue-star/article66874002.ece == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Tamil Nadu Category:1989 births
title: Ashok Selvan
